title: Swarm Intelligence Approaches in Distributed Robotics
description: This research focuses on swarm-based path optimization algorithms inspired by biological systems, applied to robotic networks.

title: Machine Learning in Sensor-Based Robotic Systems
description: An exploration of adaptive control models using sensor fusion and neural networks in autonomous robotic systems.

title: Neural Signal Encoding for Prosthetic Feedback Systems
description: A detailed study on translating neural signals into tactile feedback using deep learning for prosthetic limb control.

title: Low-Power Neuromorphic Chips for Edge AI Applications
description: Design and evaluation of neuromorphic processors optimized for energy-efficient computation in embedded edge systems.

title: Ethical Design Principles in Neural AI Systems
